text: Shongelo is an unincorporated community in Smith County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== Shongelo was founded in the 1860s, and named after Shongelo Creek. A post office called Shongelo was established in 1873, and remained in operation until 1921. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Smith County, Mississippi
title: Shongelo, Mississippi
